Name: Hedera
About the game: HEDERA is a story-driven, 2D psychological horror game focused on puzzle-solving and atmosphere. STORY Deal with Ivy's trauma through her dreams\video-games and uncover the mystery behind the Moor family's curse. FEATURES ~3 hours long. 7+endings! Take pictures, dash, and shoot! 15+ disturbing creatures! Every puzzle and creature reflects the character's fears. CONTROLS: Arrows = Move SPACE, Z or ENTER = Examine / Advance text F4 / ALT+ENTER = Fullscreen ESC, X = Menu / Cancel/Erase (text)
Meta Title: Hedera: May 21, 2020, Aiaz Marx and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hedera? Check out the release date (May 21, 2020), developer insights from Aiaz Marx, and a complete game summary.
